name: Nicholas M.Garofolo
introduction: Nicholas M. Garofolo is a New York City actor who was born in the Bronx, New York. He is second generation American and is of Italian and Irish decent. He studied acting with Master Teacher Gene Frankel at the Gene Frankel Theatre in New York City. Nicholas has played dramatic and comedic roles in feature films and on television but has also performed at Groundworks Theatre in New York City. The roles he has played include a detective, mobster, street thug, con man, doctor and lawyer. He also performed with improvisation acting groups in New York City. Nicholas has three college degrees.
